result.adr_address: G/F, Peace Mansion, 8 Peace Ave, Ho Man Tin, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: G/F, Peace Mansion, 8 Peace Ave, Ho Man Tin, Hong Kong
result.name: Black Sugar Coffee & Lifestyle

reviews.text:
Great hipster conceptual coffee shop, where you will feel immediately at ease. Some wood, a post-industrial japanese atmosphere, the decor is very well thought out, making this coffee shop pleasant and warm. The friendly but pro service is also for many.
The teas, pastries and food are very good and tasty. You will obviously pay the high price for that. But when you think about this quality level that's not so expensive.
We need more of this conceptual bright, peaceful and beautiful place in Mong Kok and Ho Man Tin - and throughout the whole city in general.
Good coffee, good food, and nice place. A well hidden gem in Mongkok area.
Nice and silent place to stay and chat with friends. But the drinks and sandwiches price is quite high.

Small, modern, bright cafe serving excellent coffee. As well as great coffee, the young people running the cafe really care about the coffee and good service. It is also a dog-lovers' cafe. There always seems to be one beautifully groomed well-behaved dog at the entrance. Highly recommended.

One of the most meticulously made cups of coffee I have ever had- and this is the sort of thing I search out. Incredibly friendly and extremely knowledgeable; our barista talked with us about every step of the pour over without pretentiousness, just a very real love for coffee and his craft. Note that the only plant milk option is oat, which made a delicious cappuccino.

result.vicinity: G/F, Peace Mansion, 8 Peace Avenue, Ho Man Tin

reviews.text:
一家在九龍區很特別的咖啡店，門口有很多泊車錶位，店內有室內及室外座位，有特定空間給狗隻主人，和毛孩一起享受咖啡。

咖啡店的咖啡質素很高，冷熱咖啡均出色。我個人喜歡熱黑咖啡及凍梳打咖啡，味道很好，很少苦澀味。

另外，這裡的西式食物及湯亦十分出色，尤其是龍蝦湯，真材實料。

This coffee shop in Kowloon is quite unique with many public parking lots near the shop. There are both indoor and outdoor seats. Dog lovers can bring their dogs to enjoy coffee and food on the outdoor seats.

The coffee and food quality is excellent. I love the hot black coffee and cold soda coffee, which are tasty and not bitter. The western food and lobster soup are both very tasty.
食物價錢偏高，但味道不錯，地方整潔，主店不超過二十個座位， 可要求暖水，有 電子儀器可以通知自取食物飲品，滿座可到旁邊另一舖位，那邊歡迎寵物，如果坐果過邊，食物飲品都係自取， 用即棄餐具，有水提供， 主人可以自行添水俾寵物飲

Great hipster conceptual coffee shop, where you will feel immediately at ease. Some wood, a post-industrial japanese atmosphere, the decor is very well thought out, making this coffee shop pleasant and warm. The friendly but pro service is also for many.
The teas, pastries and food are very good and tasty. You will obviously pay the high price for that. But when you think about this quality level that's not so expensive.
We need more of this conceptual bright, peaceful and beautiful place in Mong Kok and Ho Man Tin - and throughout the whole city in general.
처음에 너무 작아서 찾기가 어려웠음. 아주 작은 커피전문점.  아메리카노와 라떼 먹었는데..   드립으로 먹을껄 하는 후회가...   핸드드립 맛나보임 .  근처 스벅보다 좋음
Good coffee, good food, and nice place. A well hidden gem in Mongkok area.
